about_the_game:
Plunge into a puzzling exploration
of an unfortunate and tragic situation.
Dodge vicious chickens and tough bosses,
and suffer a cornucopia of painful losses,
as you venture deep inside
in a castle where the mad reside.

Explore narration filled with rhyme
and a 3-bit artstyle worth your time.
Expect tentacles and weird things,
drama, heartbreak, and golden rings,
menacing voices from the dark abyss,
and the reaper’s chilling kiss.

Venture through а short epic of grand proportions,
and lose yourself into the mind’s twisted distortions.
Among the bullet hell be cautious or be bold
to decide how the story will unfold,
but be warned there is no combat and there are no guns,
your skills in dodging will make or break your runs.




FEATURES:

  • A plethora of hand-crafted puzzles.
  • Challenging boss encounters testing your planning and observation skills.
  • A story from the depths of the abyss.
  • All dialogue and narration is fully-voiced and written in rhyme.
  • Speedrunning and scoring based on number of moves (and deaths) to finish the game.
  • A keyboard or a gamepad is all you need. Let the mouse rest!
  • Cubes and chickens. Spiders too!

content_descriptors.notes: General Mature Content. Please be warned this game discusses topics such as self-harm and suicide, and so it might not be appropriate for all audience. Always know you're loved and there are people able to help you!
